name: Vampire diary
description:
Controls

W, D or Arrows Keys to move left and right

Mouse Click and Drag to complete puzzles

This is my entry for the Narrative Driven Jam #6 in which the theme was Magical Realism. I honestly wasn't thrilled about the theme because I don't like to make settings that have any basis in reality. After a lot of thinking I thought of making a conjurer who lives in an early 80s setting and then she somehow became a vampire somewhere along the way too.

Since the game has a high volume of dialogue in its short run I thought to add voice. But I don't have good recording equipment or a good voice so I turned to TTS (Text to Speech). I used this tool to make the dialogue: https://ttstool.com/

But I don't really like the way that the robot voice sounds so I made it optional.

Music came from here: https://www.bensound.com/
